channel.title: podcasts on QWxlea
channel.description: Recent content in podcasts on QWxlea

item.title: Podcasts I'm currently listening to
item.description: Podcasts: Best #infosec #podcasts (In no particular order): Cyberwire (Daily news headlines) Risky Business (Weekly news with more in depth analysis) Smashing Security (Lighthearted take on the week’s news) Hacking Humans (Social engineering news and discussion) Cybercrime Investigations (Seems inactive) Darknet Diaries (Storytelling and history) (favourite episode) Malicious Life (Storytelling and history)
